spec.name: Modder
spec.subtitle: Obsessive Innovation
spec.description: A Modder can be extremely versatile, in some ways, a Modder specializes in generalizing. By spending less time and energy learning how to build devices from the ground up, a Modder can focus on how to optimize and customize all sorts of devices - from weapons to ships, droids to personal gear. Of course, one project might hold a Modder's interest more than others, at least for a while.
